channel.title: {Help}Getting the Lunar Spell Book
channel.description: I have lunar magics on my server but i cant get to the spell book, can someone help me with it?

item.title: {Help}Getting the Lunar Spell Book
item.dc:creator: @faded_vision Faded Vision
item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

            if (objectID == 6552 && ancients == 0) {
                emotes = 2;
                updateRequired = true;
                setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
                ancients = 1;
                sendMessage("You convert to ancient magic.");
            } else if (objectID == 6552 && ancients == 1) {
                emotes = 0;
                updateRequired = true;
                setSidebarInterface(6, LUNARIDHERE);
                ancients = 2;
                sendMessage("You convert to lunar");
            }
               else if (objectID == 6552 && ancients == 2) {
                emotes = 0;
                updateRequired = true;
                setSidebarInterface(6, NORMALMAGEINTERFACEHERE);
                ancients = 2;
                sendMessage("You convert back to normal magic");
            }

should work lol, then you switch through all books using magic book interface, or of course you could just make a 2nd alter, if your using deltascape based server which it looks like by your ints you should try using

OBJECT 410

thats default lunar altar

Hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: {Help}Getting the Lunar Spell Book
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Hmmm…Cannot seem to find the interface for lunar. The one I had one ancients…But, here’s my altar change code…

        if (objectID == 6552 && ancients == 0) {
            emotes = 2;
            updateRequired = true;
            setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
            ancients = 1;
            sendMessage("You convert to ancient magic.");
        } else if (objectID == 6552 && ancients == 1) {
            emotes = 0;
            updateRequired = true;
            setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
            ancients = 0;
            sendMessage("You convert to normal magic.");
        }

Read full topic
